this information is also on our website: www.bestbeginnings.org.uk/help
the national breastfeeding helpline number is 0300 100 0212
so what’s on the dvd?:
The DVD features one main ﬁlm (35 mins), where we meet nine different 
women and follow them on their journey, and ﬁve short ﬁlms (see below). 
Sit down, put your feet up and enjoy. If you want to watch speciﬁc bits of 
the main ﬁlm again, the following chapters are on the DVD menu:
*preparing for birth
*birth, skin
